import React from 'react'; import Header from './Header'; import Main from './Main'; import PopupWithForm from './PopupWithForm'; import Footer from './Footer'; function App() { const [openEditAvatar, setOpenEditAvatar] = React.useState(false); const [openEditProfile, setOpenEditProfile] = React.useState(false); const [openAddCard, setOpenAddCard] = React.useState(false); const handleEditAvatarClick = () => { openEditAvatar(true) }; const handleEditProfileClick = () => { openEditProfile(true) }; const handleAddPlaceClick = () => { openAddCard(true) }; return (
